subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Amid the soul-searching about the Mike Rice situation at Rutgers, there is some recognition, even in the coaching ranks, that fiery motivation can lead to personal attacks.
snippet: Amid the soul-searching about the Mike Rice situation at Rutgers, there is some recognition, even in the coaching ranks, that fiery motivation can lead to personal attacks.
